text: Ariko abanyacyubahiro bo mu bantu be bahakanye, baravuga bati “Uyu ntacyo ari cyo usibye kuba ari umuntu nkamwe, icyo ashaka ni ukwishyira hejuru (ngo abategeke). Kandi iyo Allah aza gushaka (kohereza Intumwa) yari kohereza umumalayika. Ntabwo twigeze twumva ibintu nk’ibi ku babyeyi bacu bo hambere!”
